Planning to Book Shangri-La Bengaluru ? Get inspired by Popular Reviews

Overall review on stay

PUNEET LOONA

4

About room: overall stay was excellent. Spacious rooms ( i booked king size deluxe room. Good view of bangalore city from large glass wall (spend little more to get the view of bangalore palace or vidhan sauda ) in room service was also quick. Safety measures were quite good. About restaurant and food: we had dinner at saffron restaurant which was on 18th floor. Spectacular view of bangalore city. Thanks to makemytrip for giving deal of dinner with room. Food was excellent all dishes were balanced in taste. Service was good but slow as compare to in-room dining service. We had breakfast at b cafe on ground floor. Varity of food items were available. Very spacious place with outdoor sitting. All food items were well prepared. Staff: all staff was very polite, supportive, well informed and quick. For kids: there was small play area for kids on the ground floor at b cafe. It was good but not very clean. Toys were dirty and not looked after by staff. Room restrictions: there was one strange restriction which i never came across in other properties. You are not allowed to carry speaker. I was having j bl bluetooth speaker which i thought i will play inside room while having drinks. But that was kept in concierge before we moved in the room. I hope they will remove this restriction next time i visit. ) overall score: 7/10
Safety measures were quite good but sanitizing (disinfectant) wipes were expected in the room which were not there.

Spoil with luxury

Punitha Ganapathy

5

I booked an overnight stay at Shangri-la with my 5 yr old daughter. The staycation was just booked to entertain a change of place for my 5 yr old. To start with the team at the front desk and the security were extremely friendly and ensured the guest was very well cared, for the minutest detail. The room was a standard deluxe room and the team ensured i got the top floor with a bathtub as requested. The room was spacious with a great bangalore view, bed was great with the fluffiest pillows, bathroom was top notch with a bath tub, separate toto pot and a shower arrangement. The housekeeping amenities provided were all well thought of in great detail and exceptional. The team surprised us with a plate of chocolates and doughnut assortments for my little girl and fruits when we got back from our lunch. Great work nadeem and team. The staff is extremely courteous. Our one day stay was wrapped with luxury and we are extremely happy and satisfied with the overall experience. I speak for my 5 yr old too.

Warm and pleasant stay!

Mamatha Santhosh Kumar

5

I recently stayed at Shangri-La Bengaluru shangri la and had a wonderful experience. The food was delicious and the stay was very comfortable. The front desk and all other staff were incredibly friendly and made my stay even more enjoyable. I highly recommend this Shangri-La Bengaluru to anyone looking for a great place to stay in bangalore. ”

Excellent property!

Q: How many customer reviews Shangri-La Bengaluru has?

A: 4.5/5 Rating by 647 Ratings & 261 Reviews View All reviews & Get inspired by Popular Reviews.

Q: What is the check-in and check-out time at Shangri-La Bengaluru? Is early check-in and late check-out available?

A: The standard check-in and check-out time at Shangri-La Bengaluru is 2 PM and 12 PM, respectively. You can request the property for early check-in or late check-out by directly reaching out to the property. Please note that early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability; hence, the property might not always be able to fulfil your request.

Q: Where is Shangri-La Bengaluru located? How far Shangri-La Bengaluru is from the city centre or popular landmarks?

A: Shangri-La Bengaluru is located in Bangalore. Travelling from Shangri-La Bengaluru is hassle-free since the property is well-connected to popular commercial and business areas of the city. The bustling city centre lies at a suitable distance from the Shangri-La Bengaluru. The city’s popular landmarks and most sought-after spots like
  1. Bangalore Cantt. Railway Station (1.3 km)
  2. Indira Gandhi Musical Fountain Park (1.3 km)
are all well connected from Shangri-La Bengaluru. The Shangri-La Bengaluru convenient location makes it an ideal stay option for both leisure and business travellers. Book Shangri-La Bengaluru Now.

Q: What is price range of Shangri-La Bengaluru Bangalore?

A: Price Range for Shangri-La Bengaluru hotel starts from ₹14875. Shangri-La Bengaluru Bangalore is an affordable property in this category.

  1. Bangalore Cantt. Railway Station (1.3 km)

. You must not miss visiting nearby attractions while visiting Shangri-La Bengaluru. Traveling to such interesting places is easy as the Shangri-La Bengaluru arranges for car rentals at an additional charge. You can make a request at the Hotel front desk and avail the service.
